Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar
Description: Storage jar (?) of a relatively recurrent model in Mirgissa/Iken dwellings. The body is spherical and the neckless orifice is very narrow and bordered by a very well defined convex lip. The clay is coarse, common with a mineral and organic temper, and has been polished. Black patches were caused by the piling up of vessels inside the kiln.
